Planet Hollywood.translation[0].definiti: a restaurant in some cities around the world, based on the theme (=subject) of the cinema and selling typical American food. It is owned by several well-known film actors, including Demi Moore, Bruce Willis, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and Sylvester Stallone. Customers can watch short pieces of film while they eat, and are surrounded by objects that are connected with films. They can also buy goods with the Planet Hollywood name on, such as T-shirts and hats.
